meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> is <radical>correct</radical>, <kanji>absolutely</kanji>. The mighty sun is never wrong. It is absolutely correct, always.
readingMnemonic: Then, a <reading>ze</reading>ppelin (ぜ) flies in front of the sun, blocking it out. <kanji>Absolutely</kanji>, the sun cannot ignore this transgression. Therefore, the sun corrects the zeppelin’s evil ways by frying it with sunshine and bringing it to the ground.
